definitions.definition: use or add in place of.
examples: dried rosemary can be substituted for the fresh herb
synonyms: swap "cottage cheese can be substituted for yogurt"

definitions.definition: act or serve as a substitute.
examples: I found someone to substitute for me
synonyms: fill someone's boots/shoes "the senate was empowered to substitute for the president"

examples: customs officers substituted the drugs with another substance

definitions.definition: replace (a sports player) with a substitute during a contest.
examples: he was substituted for Nichols in the fifth inning

definitions.definition: replace (an atom or group in a molecule, especially a hydrogen atom) with another.
(of a compound) in which one or more hydrogen atoms have been replaced by other atoms or groups.
